item.title: [Msn] AznRx's super nudge attack
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

This is which worked for me… (I think wont work for you :P)

[code]////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// AZNRX MSN SUPER NUDGER //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Description - Opens an Msn conversation window with someone then //
// clicks nudge, closes it and repeats. //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Instructions //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// 1. Press play or type Ctrl + Alt + R or hit the F9 button. //
// 2. Click Select Color button and select your victims mini display //
// picture icon (The one beside their name on your buddy list). //
// 3. Next, fill in how many times you want to annoy your victim. //
// 4. Watch your victim, helplessly try to stop you. //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Notes: - Will only work if victims mini display picture icon //
// (The one beside their name on your buddy list) is colored.//
// - If you want to test this out on a computer run account, //
// add smarterchild@hotmail.com to your buddy list. //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Version History //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// v1.0 Beta - Worked with mouse coords only, buggy //
// v1.1 - Fixed lag problems //
// v1.2 - Fixed opening procedure //
// v1.3 - Made it a bit slower, so it doesnt crap out comp //
// v1.4 - Made bitmaps instead of just colors //
// v1.5 - Made progress report //
// v1.6 - Incorporated in a counter in progress report //
// v1.7 - Created form, made it user friendly //
// v1.8 - Fixed errors and bugs in form //
// v1.9 - Made closing procedure faster and more flawless //
// v2.0 - Final release, works great, enjoy! //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

program MsnNudger;

var
many: integer;
color: integer;
x, y: integer;
count: integer;
nudge: Integer;
frmDesign: TForm;
Banner: TLabel;
Label1: TLabel;
TimesT: TLabel;
Button1: TButton;
HowMany: TEdit;
Start: TButton;

const
VictimCoordX = 809;
VictimCoordY = 249;
VictimCoordX2 = 812;
VictimCoordY2 = 255;

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure LoadBMapNudge;
begin
Nudge := BitmapFromString(12, 7, ‘z78DA7D90497243210C44AF04’ +
‘68009668BAFF9122BE6C9793455874C1A3D512448430291EC486D’ +
‘072B163EF5C24223AAD08371A1FF2596F6213661E37FFE389469C’ +
‘3942BD4875A98E5F39E90922533A0BFB9F1CA524EE04A9075DF73’ +
‘9D82B877908AC22994340EFC9AF9A2840943E6FB90982773F5152’ +
‘11D9B608CCD26792AC35BC052FBF13D63FA4D6241BFD2B21ABBC6’ +
‘33ACD20B96D38A97C5F6400E3F15BE931C2D1A2E9044D42B85301’ +
‘B948DDFEF6D42436A08558367B3AAEF2A82F1BD36033808E39601’ +
‘42F52FA4ABB093D441DDA0F01FF771B’);
end;

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure openvictim;
begin
if (findcolor(x, y, color, VictimCoordX, VictimCoordY, VictimCoordX2, VictimCoordY2) = True) then
begin
clickmouse(x, y, True);
wait(100)
clickmouse(x, y, True);
wait(550)
end;
end;

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure NudgeN;
begin
if (findbitmapin(nudge, x, y, 39, 361, 639, 710) = True) then
begin
wait(50)
clickmouse(x, y, True);
count := count + 1;
end;
ClearDebug;
writeln(’============================================’)
writeln(’ NUDGE [ AznRx Created ] MADNESS ‘)
writeln(’============================================’)
writeln(’ You nugged victim ’ + IntToStr(count) + ’ times!’)
writeln(’============================================’)
end;

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure closevictim;
begin
Sendkeys(chr(27));
end;

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

procedure DeclareVar;
begin
many := StrToInt(howmany.Text);
end;

procedure buttonclick(sender: TObject);
begin
pickcolor(color, x, y)
end;

procedure ButtonClick2(sender: TObject);
begin
frmDesign.Caption := frmDesign.Caption + ‘.’;
frmDesign.ModalResult := mrOk;
end;

procedure InitForm;
begin
frmDesign := CreateForm;
frmDesign.Left := 250;
frmDesign.Top := 114;
frmDesign.Width := 276;
frmDesign.Height := 200;
frmDesign.Cursor := crCross;
frmDesign.Caption := 'AznRx Msn Nudger ';
frmDesign.Color := clWhite;
frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
frmDesign.Font.Name := ‘MS Sans Serif’;
frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
frmDesign.Visible := false;
frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
Banner := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Banner.Parent := frmDesign;
Banner.Left := 9;
Banner.Top := 8;
Banner.Width := 250;
Banner.Height := 41;
Banner.Cursor := crCross;
Banner.Caption := ‘AznRx Msn Nudger’;
Banner.Color := clBtnFace;
Banner.Font.Color := clSilver;
Banner.Font.Height := -33;
Banner.Font.Name := ‘Impact’;
Banner.Font.Style := [];
Banner.ParentColor := False;
Banner.ParentFont := False;
Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
Label1.Left := 56;
Label1.Top := 101;
Label1.Width := 85;
Label1.Height := 13;
Label1.Caption := ‘Nudge your victim’;
TimesT := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
TimesT.Parent := frmDesign;
TimesT.Left := 170;
TimesT.Top := 101;
TimesT.Width := 24;
TimesT.Height := 13;
TimesT.Caption := ‘times’;
Button1 := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Button1.Parent := frmDesign;
Button1.OnClick := @buttonclick;
Button1.Left := 97;
Button1.Top := 63;
Button1.Width := 73;
Button1.Height := 25;
Button1.Cursor := crCross;
Button1.Hint := ‘Set mini display color’;
Button1.Caption := ‘Set Color’;
Button1.ParentShowHint := False;
Button1.ShowHint := True;
Button1.TabOrder := 8;
HowMany := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
HowMany.Parent := frmDesign;
HowMany.Left := 146;
HowMany.Top := 98;
HowMany.Width := 20;
HowMany.Height := 19;
HowMany.TabOrder := 9;
HowMany.Text := ‘10’;
Start := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
Start.Parent := frmDesign;
Start.OnClick := @buttonclick2;
Start.Left := 12;
Start.Top := 129;
Start.Width := 244;
Start.Height := 25;
Start.Cursor := crCross;
Start.Caption := ‘Start Madness’;
Start.TabOrder := 11;
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
ThreadSafeCall(‘InitForm’, v);
end;

function ShowFormModal: Boolean;
begin
Result := False;
if (frmDesign.ShowModal = mrOk) then
Result := True;
end;

function SafeShowFormModal: Boolean;
var
v: TVariantArray;
begin
setarraylength(V, 0);
result := ThreadSafeCall(‘ShowFormModal’, v);
end;

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

begin
LoadBMapNudge;
count := 0;
activateclient;
SafeInitForm;
SafeShowFormModal;
declarevar;
repeat
openvictim;
NudgeN;
closevictim;
until (count = many);
if count > 20 then
begin
writeln(’ Your friends pissed ‘)
writeln(’=================== (o.o) ==================’)
end;
end.[/code]

So I only made couple small fixes… that’s all

Read full topic

Updated to v2.2[/font][/size][/center]
[center] //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // AZNRX MSN SUPER NUDGER // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Description - Opens an Msn conversation window with someone then // // clicks nudge, closes it and repeats. // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Notes: - Will only work if victims mini display picture icon // // (The one beside their name on your buddy list) is colored.// // - If you want to test this out on a computer run account, // // add smarterchild@hotmail.com to your buddy list. // // - Try to pick a unique color for Instruction 2. // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // Version History // //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// // v1.0 Beta - Worked with mouse coords only, buggy // // v1.1 - Fixed lag problems // // v1.2 - Fixed opening procedure // // v1.3 - Made it a bit slower, so it doesnt crap out comp // // v1.4 - Made bitmaps instead of just colors // // v1.5 - Made progress report // // v1.6 - Incorporated in a counter in progress report // // v1.7 - Created form, made it user friendly // // v1.8 - Fixed errors and bugs in form // // v1.9 - Made closing procedure faster and more flawless // // v2.0 - Release, works // // v2.1 - Added xs,ys xe,ye Coords. Thanks to Janilabo. // // v2.2 - Updated form // ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Please Report Bugs here for fixing[/center]
